TopicTitle: Positive Feedback: Just a quick thank you.

Articles.Content:
I created two threads in dev support, both of which have been thoroughly answered by a multitude of devs and smart people. I just wanted to say thank you for maintaining the appearance of being a really damn good community. And this goes out to everybody who is contributing in a similar way, providing help and support in a proper way. And sal_vager's Good Conduct Guide is inspiring. Like damn.

That's it. Thank you.

Edited February 20, 2016 by Darbin Giesorg
Link included.
Well, I'm not really sure who gave your post a one-star rating, but I can assure you that they are an anomaly. Welcome aboard!

Your welcome, welcome to the KSP forums!
